Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the main character, Human Meteor, his alter ego Duke, and sets up the initial conflicts: a taxi ride, pursuit, ambush, and his transformation into a superhero to confront these threats.

sub_scenes.title: Comic Book Cover and Taxi Ride Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the comic, the hero, and Duke's initial taxi driving scenario, setting the stage for the unfolding events.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit, Ambush, and Transformation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the escalating danger Duke faces as he is pursued and ambushed, leading to his dramatic transformation into The Human Meteor.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Ambush at the Pier

Major_Arcs.title: Pier Confrontation and Yacht Mission Setup
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Human Meteor's immediate response to the attackers, the police arrival, and the briefing that sets up his next mission involving a suspicious yacht and the capture of G-Man Holden.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Police Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor dealing with the attackers and the arrival of the police, resolving the immediate pier-side conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Briefing and Yacht Infiltration Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts the narrative towards a new objective as Human Meteor receives a briefing about a suspicious yacht and plans his infiltration.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Infiltration and Submarine Discovery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Toby's undercover mission on the yacht, his discovery of the submarine plot, and the revelation of his true role and success.

sub_scenes.title: Undercover on the Yacht and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Pete/Toby acting undercover on the yacht, searching for information which leads to his capture.

sub_scenes.title: Mission Reveal and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves Toby's capture by revealing his true mission, his success, and the crucial discovery of the submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Return, Submarine Discovery, and Mission Reveal

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Confrontation and Submarine Attack
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Human Meteor's underwater mission, his discovery of the submarine threat, the arrival of allies, and the climactic attack on the submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Descent and Submarine Threat Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor diving to the submarine and realizing the scale of the underwater threat.

sub_scenes.title: Allied Divers and Enemy Activity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces allied divers joining the mission and reveals the enemy's activity around the submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Combat and Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the underwater combat between Human Meteor and enemy divers, and their subsequent escape from the submarine area.

sub_scenes.title: Torpedo Attack and Ship Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor's direct attack on the submarine and the ship's reaction to the underwater explosion.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Mission Debrief
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Human Meteor storyline by focusing on the investigation of the yacht, the discovery regarding Peter, and the final debrief, leading to a domestic scene with Toby.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Boarding and Peter's Fate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor boarding the yacht and making a grim discovery regarding Peter.

narrative_arcs.title: Informing the Navy about Peter's Map

sub_scenes.title: Mission Wrap-up and Domestic Scene
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides closure to the Human Meteor story with a speedboat journey, hospital visit, and a final domestic scene with Toby.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Drive and Bedtime for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends and Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline focused on the Liberty Lads fighting Nazi fiends, and a parallel scene involving an ambulance and a mysterious wallet.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads in Combat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the conflict between the Liberty Lads and Nazi Fiends.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Wallet Clue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a separate narrative thread involving an ambulance and two boys who find a wallet, leading to a new mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Clue

Major_Arcs.title: Boys and Mr. Horst Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys as they try to return the wallet, leading them to a dangerous encounter with Mr. Horst and a sinister plot.

sub_scenes.title: Bus Chase and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the boys' attempt to catch the bus and their encounter with a policeman who takes them to Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Chasing the Bus for Wallet Return

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Violent Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the boys' frightening encounter with Mr. Horst, his interrogation, and the escalating threat against them.

narrative_arcs.title: Waiting on the Bench and Approaching Threat

sub_scenes.title: Major Bronson's Intervention and Showdown
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Major Bronson's sudden intervention, his alternative plan to harm the boys, and the escalating violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Melee and Call to Stop

Major_Arcs.title: Marine Barracks Attack and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys seeking help, the attack on the Marine Barracks, the confrontation with Nazis, and the final resolution of the Nazi spy ring threat.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Marine Help and Secret Office Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the boys seeking help from Marines and one boy discovering a secret office with sabotage plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Marine Help at the Waterfront
Discovery and Confrontation in the Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Attack on Marine Barracks and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the Nazi attack on the Marine Barracks, Skip's defense, and the direct confrontation with Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Intervention and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the Marines intervening, the immediate aftermath, and the resolution of the Nazi spy ring plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Congratulations for Stopping Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry in a new adventure set in South America, involving intrigue, kidnapping, and conflict with Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Arrival in South America
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Champ and Henry and their arrival in a South American town amidst political intrigue.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry in Intrigue

sub_scenes.title: Officers' Investigation and Rosita's Kidnapping
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the officers' widespread investigation related to Rosita's kidnapping and their interactions with civilians and Champ and Henry.

narrative_arcs.title: Escort to Consul and Investigation Inquiry
Explanation of Rosita's Kidnapping and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Capture and Plot Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals El Tigre's plot and the capture of Champ and Henry, leading to an unexpected encounter with 'Mama'.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the planning and execution of the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout, including a diversion tactic.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Approach to El Tigre
Approaching Guards and Confrontation with El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Twist, and Rosita's Absence
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the interrogation of a captured man and a twist regarding Axis agents, alongside a parallel search for Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Twist Regarding Axis Agents

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding, Clarification, and Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene clarifies the role of 'Tigre' and sets up the rescue mission for Rosita, shifting from interrogation to action.

narrative_arcs.title: Misunderstanding and Clarification about El Tigre
Rosita's Location Revealed and Rescue Mission Initiated

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit, Infiltration, and Rescue of Rosita
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the active pursuit, infiltration of the Citadel, and the successful rescue of Rosita.

sub_scenes.title: Combat Climax and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the final close combat encounters, the expression of gratitude from Rosita, and the arrival of government forces, leading to a celebratory resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Government Forces and Manhunt

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, his disobedience of orders, his capture, torture, and the surprising turn of events with the native chief.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Introduction and Military Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and shifts to a military briefing about his actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat and Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan
Reassurance and Trust in Dolan's Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arrival, Ambush, and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dolan's arrival in the jungle, the sense of unease, and a sudden ambush leading to capture.

sub_scenes.title: Torture and Plan Handover
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the captured soldier being brought before Grauer, suspicious observations about Dolan, and the brutal torture to extract plans.

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Attack, and Chief's Demise
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the arson, a marine attack, and the escalating chaos leading to the native chief's accidental death and its consequences.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine's Attack and Attempt to Stop Him
Burning Native Huts and Flames' Surge
Arsonist's Gloating and Reassurance to Sam
Chief's Death and Native Homage to Marine
Explanation of Chief's Betrayal and Liberation
Post-Conflict Dialogue and Pursuit of Grauer

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma, Sam's Onslaught, and Disciplinary Action
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the Devil Dog Dolan storyline with the captain's dilemma, Sam's violent reaction, and a surprising disciplinary action by Dolan.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Murder Mystery Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and the start of their murder mystery investigation, focusing on a banker's murder and the initial suspects.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Initial Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets up the initial chaotic scene and premise for their new story.

sub_scenes.title: News Assignment and Hospital Investigation Start
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the news assignment for Dan and Diane and their initial investigation at the hospital, following a lead about Tom Reilly's sick child.

narrative_arcs.title: The News Assignment and Initial Clues
Hospital Investigation and Miss Reilly's Condition

Major_Arcs.title: Barnacci Suspicion and Reilly Pursuit
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Twinkle Twins' investigation as they develop suspicions about Barnacci, contact their editor, and pursue Tom Reilly in the Irish section of town.

sub_scenes.title: Barnacci Suspicion and Contacting Elijah
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Diane and Dan developing suspicions about Barnacci and Dan contacting Elijah for further investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store

sub_scenes.title: Search in Irish Section and Mrs. Murphy's Information
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dan and Diane's search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section and their encounter with Mrs. Murphy, who provides crucial information.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Farnacci's Blood Transfusion and Mob Threat

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Chase and Confrontation with Reilly
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the taxi chase after Tom Reilly, the roadblock by the community, and the armed confrontation.

Major_Arcs.title: Street Brawl, Police Intervention, and Medical Emergency
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contains a separate street brawl incident and the escalating medical emergency for Tom Reilly, leading to a community blood donation effort.

sub_scenes.title: Street Brawl and Police Response
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a street brawl and the subsequent police intervention to restore order.

sub_scenes.title: Police Apprehension and Emergency Transport
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the police apprehending the vehicles and the emergency transport of a shooting victim.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Ride and Hospital Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the anxious ambulance ride and the arrival at the hospital, focusing on the concern for the injured.

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion Crisis and Community Support
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the medical crisis with the blood transfusion need, the initial mismatch, and the community's appeal and response.

narrative_arcs.title: Diagnosis: Blood Transfusion Needed for Mrs. Murphy
Seeking Blood Donors and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call for Blood Donors for Tom Reilly
Community Response and Arrival of Blood Donors
Blood Type Verification and Donation Process
Blood Transfusion and Tom Reilly's Recovery
Anticipation of Tom Reilly Revealing Information

Major_Arcs.title: Justice for Farnacci and Birthday Celebration
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Twinkle Twins storyline by focusing on the pursuit of justice for Farnacci's crimes, his apprehension, and the celebratory birthday party for Reilly's daughter, providing a happy resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Demand for Justice and Police Raid
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the public demand for justice against Farnacci and the police action to raid the poolroom to apprehend him.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Justice and Plan to Capture Farnacci
Police Pursuit and Raid to Arrest Farnacci
Confrontation and Apprehension at the Poolroom

sub_scenes.title: Birthday Party Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Twinkle Twins story with a joyful birthday party, signifying a happy ending and resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Celebratory Birthday Party for Reilly's Daughter
